name: 斜視
content: 斜視 treatment may aggravate squint or amblyopia (lazy eye) 黃斑點 (Macula) (Cornea) The consequences of squint Besides negative cosmetic effects squint also causes impairment in 3-dimensional vision (stereoscopic vision). In addition due to the brains suppression of the visual message from the deviated eye squint may lead to lazy eye (amblyopia) in infants and young children if not properly treated. E (Lens) (Light) Clarifications O Most types of squint cannot be cured by medication alone O Squint usually does not disappear with age TL (Pupil) 瑪麗醫院 Queen Mary Hospital 玻璃體 (Vitreous) (Anterior Chamber) by itself (Optic Nerve) 虹膜 Iris) 視網膜 (Retina) 眼球縱切面圖 SER ( 6) BR TOT Treatment Earliest possible detection of squint followed by proper treatment is of utmost importance in preventing undesirable visual consequences. In case of doubt one should not hesitate to seek advice from a family physician paediatrician or eye doctor. Treatment modalities include: - O Wearing appropriate corrective lenses O Appropriate eye alignment & binocularity (orthoptic exercise) Occlusion of the non-squinting eye may be prescribed for some young kids for prevention or treatment of lazy eye C Surgical operation Treatment must be supervised by eye doctors and orthoptists as inappropriate O When infants fix their eyes on near objects their eyes may appear converging but it is not squinting (e.g. when an infant is being breast-fed) Short sightedness long-sightedness and squint are three different eye problems Covering the undeviated eye in a patient with squint only helps to prevent the occurrence lazy eye but this may not correct the squint O No food or vitamin has been proven to alleviate squint O Seating position in the classroom does not aggravate or cause squint 進入廿一世紀整個港島區的眼科服務進行了整 合透過瑪麗醫院及葛亮洪醫院眼科部門的協作提升 眼科臨床醫護的水平及效率為港島市民提供優質現代 1ER H ERO 8 我們各醫院的眼科專業人員包括眼科醫生、護 士、視光師及視覺矯正師等等組成一支強大的眼科專 * FIE # * Toth 199 亦負責策劃和推行區內眼科服務的長遠發展並培訓眼 科醫護專職人員提升市民的健康質素。 SQUINT # # Queen Mary Hospital Pamphlet Topic & Department Code Should you have any queries please consult your doctor during follow-up Ownership Last review/revision Approval Distribution OMH/Eye-24 Mar/2012 HKWC Information Pamphlet Working Group As requested L Queen Mary Hospital Tel: 2255 3111 斜視 SQUINT C手術治療 簡介 眼球視軸不正雙眼不能同時注視同 一目標稱為斜視。這是由於雙眼的 眼外肌肉未能協調控制雙眼的位置。 根據偏差的方向斜視眼可分為「上 下不協調」和「左右不協調」兩種。 左右不協調斜視眼又可分為內斜視和 外斜視。 內斜視:即一般人俗稱的「鬥雞 眼」是指眼睛向內(或鼻樑)傾移。 外斜視:即指眼睛向外偏移遠離正 常位置。 斜視眼又可以分為有持續型和間歇 型間歇型只在疲倦、身體不適或不 專注時才有斜視的現象。 斜視眼的影響 斜視眼除了影響外觀也會使患者喪 失「立體視像」(STEREOSCOPIC VISION是由於腦部對斜視眼所接收 的影像訊息加以抑制。若斜視眼發生 在嬰兒或兒童時期而沒有及時處理 可能導致弱視眼俗稱「惰性眼」 (LAZY EYE) • 正確的觀念 絕大部份斜視不能單靠藥物治癒 C斜視不會因年紀增長而消失 如幼嬰吃母乳時兩隻眼珠內眾並不 是斜視 C近視、遠視和斜視是三種不同的眼 睛毛病 C把沒有斜視的眼遮蓋可以防止演 變成弱視但不可糾正斜視 C沒有任何食物或維他命可改善斜視 課室內的坐位位置不會導致或加深 斜視眼 Introduction Squint can be described as a malignment of the two eyes so that both eyes cannot be directed towards the object of regard simultaneously. The eye deviation can either be vertical or horizontal. Horizontal deviations can be subdivided into convergent and divergent forms. The convergent form is also refered as cock-eyed meaning that one eye is deviated inwardly towards the nose while in the divergent form the eye is deviated outwards. In addition squinting can occur constantly or intermittently. Intermittent squint is only obvious under certain circumstances such as when one is tired ill or inattentive. 治療 愈早得到適當的治療影響視力愈 少特別是在幼兒階段。如有任何懷 疑可請教你的家庭或眼科醫生。 正斜視的方法包括: C眼部運動可以適當調整視軸 形成的因素 包括先天性或後天性。後天性的因素 有很多如意外或疾病影響眼神經或 視力、眼球肌肉疾病或雙眼屈光(遠/ 近視不協調等。 ●佩帶合適的眼鏡可改善雙眼的屈光 不協調 若孩子患有弱視可以遮蓋視力較 好的眼睛有助改善斜視眼的弱 視。但必須經過眼科醫生和視覺矯 正師(ORTHOPTIST的指導否則 可能加重斜視和弱視 The causes of squint Squint is caused by improper coordination of the two eyes. It can be congenital (since birth) or acquired (formed after birth). Acquired causes include accidents diseases of nervous system or eye muscles and refractive error (short-sightedness or long-sightedness). 如有其他疑問可於覆診時向醫 生查詢
